subject: How to test the Helper and View classes of an EJB
msgSnippet: Hi, everybody This is my first mail on this group as i am new to JUnit. I need help on testing the Helper and View classes of an EJB. These classes receive 1
messageBody:
Hi, everybody
This is my first mail on this group as i am new to JUnit.

I need help on testing the Helper and View classes of an EJB. These classes receive 1 user defined object as a parameter, without which they will not work.

Anybody please tell me how to do this with as minimal change in source code as possible.


Thanx
The Ghost Who Lives
